org.openscience.cdk
Class ChemObject

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.openscience.cdk.ChemObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
CDKConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
Atom, AtomContainer, ElectronContainer, Element
public class ChemObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements CDKConstants

The base class for all chemical objects in this cdk. It provides methods for adding listeners and for their notification of events, as well a a hash table for administration of physical or chemical properties

Constructor Detail

ChemObject

public ChemObject()
Method Detail

addListener

public void addListener(ChemObjectListener col)
Use this to add yourself to this ChemObject as a listener. In order to do so, you must implement the ChemObjectListener Interface
Parameters:
col - You, the ChemObjectListener

removeListener

public void removeListener(ChemObjectListener col)
Use this to remove a ChemObjectListener from the ListenerList of this ChemObject. It will then not be notified of change in this object anymore
Parameters:
col - The ChemObjectListener to be removed

notifyChanged

protected void notifyChanged()
This should be triggered by an method that changes the content of an object to that the registered listeners can react to it.

getSize

public int getSize()
Return the size of this ChemObject. This could be the number of atoms for a Molecule or the number of Electron in a bond
Returns:
The size of the ChemObject

setSize

public void setSize(int size)
Set the Size of this ChemObject.
Parameters:
size - The size of this ChemObject
